name: CubeNexus
description: CubeNexus is a software startup developing innovative solutions for data monetization and geolocation. Our flagship B2B SaaS product enables companies to monetize dead or unused data by geocoding it with unparalleled precision. The software organizes data into a time-based, volumetric location system, allowing businesses to extract actionable insights from previously underutilized datasets.
one_liner: CubeNexus is a software startup developing innovative solutions for data monetization and geolocation. Our flagship B2B SaaS product enables companies to monetize dead or unused data by geocoding it with unparalleled precision. The software organizes data into a time-based, volumetric location system, allowing businesses to extract actionable insights from previously underutilized datasets.
